articles.content: The Apple AirPods Max are some of the best wireless headphones you can currently buy – quite a feat considering they're the company's first crack at an over-ear design. Yes, they're expensive, but th… [+8785 chars]

articles.title: Firefox Reality axed as Mozilla gives up on VR browser - SlashGear
articles.description: Mozilla has announced that Firefox Reality, the VR-based web browser it released in 2018, is being shuttered…sort of. According to the company, a version of the browser will live on as Wolvic…
